title: Correction: Nicotine's Defensive Function in Nature
fullText:
In PLoS Biology, volume 2, issue 8

Nicotine's Defensive Function in Nature

        Anke Steppuhn, Klaus Gase, Bernd Krock, Rayko Halitschke, Ian T. Baldwin

DOI: 10.1371/journal.pbio.0020217

The Academic Editor was erroneously listed as Michael Levine. The Academic Editor for this paper is Joy Bergelson, Chicago University.

This correction note may be found online at DOI: 10.1371/journal.pbio.0020382.
